review_text: Bad: Need more than 2 small drawers The pillows given were too hard but when replaced w down - perfect!. Good: The breakfast was just enough for busy travelers served on each floor. The cocktails on the 6th floor was wonderful. The rooms were exceptionally clean and the beds were very comfortable The staff Gabriel, Rachel and Drake went out of their way to make our stay wonderful I would recommend this hotel highly
review_title: The Staff the Kinzie Hotel in Chicago went above and beyond for us.
